string-array.name: data_name
string-array.item: Kanye West
Jay-Z
Eminem
Tupac Shakur
The Notorious B.I.G.
Drake
Nas
Kendrick Lamar
Lil Wayne
Snoop Dogg

string-array.name: data_description
string-array.item: Rapper and producer from Chicago known for hits like "Stronger" and "Gold Digger." Famous for blending hip-hop, electronic, and soul.
Brooklyn rapper and businessman with classic albums like "The Blueprint" and "Reasonable Doubt." Successful in music, fashion, and sports.
Detroit rapper known for his fast flow and complex lyrics. Hits include "Lose Yourself" and "Rap God."
West Coast rapper known for pioneering gangsta rap. Hits include "Gin and Juice" and "Drop It Like It's Hot."
East Coast rapper famous for storytelling in songs like "Juicy" and "Big Poppa."
Canadian rapper blending rap with RNB and pop. Notable albums include "Take Care" and "Scorpion."
Lyricist known for introspective and socially aware lyrics. Influential in rap for his storytelling and poetic style.
Compton rapper known for socially conscious lyrics in albums like "To Pimp a Butterfly" and "DAMN."
Known for wordplay and Southern rap style. Continues to push genre boundaries with creative albums.
West Coast rapper with a unique style combining street authenticity and mainstream appeal.

string-array.name: data_awards

"23 Grammy Awards, Rock and Roll Hall of Fame inductee"
"15 Grammy Awards, Academy Award for Best Original Song"
"MTV Video Music Awards, American Music Awards, Hip Hop Hall of Fame"
"3 Grammy Awards, Billboard Music Award, MTV Video Music Award"
"4 Grammy Awards, 27 Billboard Music Awards"
"13 Grammy Nominations, BET Hip Hop Award for Lyricist of the Year"

"5 Grammy Awards, Billboard Music Award for Top Rap Artist"
"1 Grammy Award, BET Lifetime Achievement Award"
